revision.comment: little note about this function not actually working
revision.text:
__NOTOC__ int '''GetThingUDMFInt''' (int ''thingid'', string ''key'') {{planned}}
== Usage ==
Retrieves a value for a custom user key set for a thing. (Not implemented yet)
=== Parameters === *''thingid'' :The [[TID]] of the thing. *''key'' :The name given to the user key.
=== Return value === The int value that was set for this user key.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[category:ACS Information functions]]
